name: Chai Tea Chicken
description: Black tea, such as chai tea, contains important antioxidants called polyphenols, which may offer cardio and cancer protection.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients (except chicken) and stir.
Add chicken. Cover and marinate for at least 60 minutes prior to cooking.
Grill chicken over medium-high heat for approximately 5-6 minutes on each side. Serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with rice and prepared Epicure Salsa.
